issue.title: [CF 931] LUA. Error after Animation added
issue.body:
Hey,

after I added the activation border to some of my important auras, I get a Lua. Error after typing /tmw. Everytime I wanna config some stuff I get this:

Message: ...onModules\IconModule_IconContainer\IconContainer.lua:82: attempt to index local 'IconModule_IconContainer' (a nil value)
Time: 03/06/14 14:39:54
Count: 12
Stack: ...onModules\IconModule_IconContainer\IconContainer.lua:82: in function `OnStop'
...n\Components\EventHandlers\Animations\Animations.lua:731: in function `Animations_Stop'
...n\Components\EventHandlers\Animations\Animations.lua:744: in function `Animations_StopAll'
...n\Components\EventHandlers\Animations\Animations.lua:753: in function <...n\Components\EventHandlers\Animations\Animations.lua:751>
(tail call): ?
[C]: ?
[string "safecall Dispatcher[3]"]:9: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[3]"]:5>
(tail call): ?
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1423: in function `Fire'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Icon.lua:596: in function `DisableIcon'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Icon.lua:622: in function <Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Icon.lua:606>
(tail call): ?
...
[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:9: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:5>
(tail call): ?
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2681: in function `Update'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2896: in function `LockToggle'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2952: in function `?'
...ns\Bartender4\libs\AceConsole-3.0\AceConsole-3.0.lua:94: in function `?'
Interface\FrameXML\ChatFrame.lua:4315: in function `ChatEdit_ParseText'
Interface\FrameXML\ChatFrame.lua:3969: in function `ChatEdit_SendText'
Interface\FrameXML\ChatFrame.lua:4008: in function `ChatEdit_OnEnterPressed'
[string "*:OnEnterPressed"]:1: in function <[string "*:OnEnterPressed"]:1>

Locals: <none>

How can I fix this without loosing the animations?


> Posted by CurseForge user laviamor | Imported from CurseForge issue #931 | Raw

> Posted by CurseForge user phoo2

This problem was fixed in October of last year. Download the latest alpha version (http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/files/) to get the fix.

Edited Mar 18, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
